data.name: Trainz 2022 DLC - Pro Train: Class 68 Chiltern Railways
data.detailed_description:
The Class 68 is a type of mainline mixed traffic diesel-electric locomotive manufactured by Stadler Rail (and previously by Vossloh España) for Direct Rail Services (DRS) in the United Kingdom. design is derived from the Stadler Eurolight, and Stadler's product name for this variant is the UKLight. its introduction in 2014, the Class 68 has been used on numerous passenger and freight operations. addition to DRS's freight operations, the operator has also used the type to haul various charter trains. Several units have been subleased to other operators, including Chiltern Railways, Abellio ScotRail, and TransPennine Express, for passenger services, hauling various rakes of carriages. This dlc - made by 3DZUG for the Pro Train series, is the Chiltern Railways livery.

- BR Class 68 Chiltern Railways
- Nameplates (Oxford Flyer)
- Running Numbers
- Realistic model and textures
- Realistic drivers cabin
- Functional sunblend
- AWS Support
- Wipers
- Cabin displays

data.short_description: Drive the modern TransPenning Express livery Class 68 diesel-electric locomotive!
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian, French, German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
